history.content:
You do need to enroll. The process of applying to CPT for CS students is handled by Prof. Hilfinger and is here: https://people.eecs.berkeley.edu/~hilfingr/cpt.html. Go on the BIO website or email Prof. Hilfinger to learn more.

___________________________________________________________________

Yes, you will need to enroll in the course in order to obtain work authorization (new I-20).

You do need to enroll. The process of applying to CPT for CS students is handled by Prof. Hilfinger and is here: https://people.eecs.berkeley.edu/~hilfingr/cpt.html. Go on the BIO website or email Prof. Hilfinger to learn more.
I am an international student, and I have a summer internship this summer. Am I require to take the 1 unit CS197? I don't want to pay for the course, and I don't need the unit anyway.
history.subject: CPT required?
